title: my power went out and i got leaverbusted..
body: i was wondering if you could release my leaver buster penalty, i was doing well in my game and the power cut out, you can double check and what not, if you need information let me know please.

replies.body: Its unfortunate that your power went out causing you to DC, but leaver buster penalties are [not removed under any circumstances.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h2q6)
yeah it sucks, but oh well i did the games none the less, its jsut a pain to do 5  of them with 20 min ques
Im really sorry to hear that bro. Too bad though that the program is coded so that it's not removed despite the reason behind your dc.
